template.name: Unifi AP
template.description:
uses mca-dump via ssh to get AP info.
Assign this template to all APs in your site

template.name: Unifi Protect Cloud Key
template.description: Assign this template to your Cloud Keys running Protect

template.name: Unifi Protect NVR4
template.description: Assign this template to your UNVR4s running Protect

template.name: Unifi Switch
template.description: Link this template to all Unifi switches

macro.description: AP Zabbix SSH Username - UDMP only supports root

template.name: Unifi WiFi Site
template.description: This template is meant to collect WiFi data across all of a site's APs. Assign to one of the APs and set the {$UNIFI_AP_GROUP} macro to the name of a group that contains all of the APs you want to aggregate against.

macro.description: The name of the group containing the site MAPs
